content: pattern notes vest is worked in two pieces from the bottom up and seamed the hem armhole edging and neck edging are worked in post stitch ribbing while the body of the vest is worked in a double_crochet mesh pattern finished measurements bust 36-3/4 40-3/4 44-3/4 48-3/4 52-3/4 56-3/4 60-3/4 64-3/4 68-3/4 length 18 19 19 20 21 22 22 23 24 materials premier® yarns serenity® chunky 100% acrylic 3 5oz/100g 109yds/100m 700-54 greige 4 4 5 5 6 6 7 7 7 balls hook us sizes j-10 6 mm and k-101/2 6 5 mm or size needed to obtain gauge notions tapestry needle skills/techniques used in pattern chain double_crochet and post stitches decreases seaming with whipstitch
